name: Cable Craze: The Spoon't Challenge
description:
Welcome to Cable Craze: The Spoon't Challenge!

This is a simple puzzle game about wiring outlets together and using a debugging tool accidentally left in the game made in 7 days for the b3agz game jam, and we hope you enjoy it.

You can find a lot more info in the in-game info screen!

If you are on windows we recommend downloading the (very rushed) windows build as it runs a lot nicer than the web version.

ControlsA/DMove Left/Right

Space
Jump, or if in rapid succession after landing from a dash, super jump
S
Dash downwards
Enter/EBegin wiring
QOpen Spoon't
NRAQBWATA

Not Really Asked Questions But We Answered Them Anyway. (It's like a FAQ)

Was this hard to make?

yes

Did you spend all your time on wires?

yes

Do the wires at least work?

no

Why the name?
